name: ESTATE of Marcia DeForest POST, Deceased. Appeal of Katherine POST

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: ESTATE of Marcia DeForest POST, Deceased. Appeal of Katherine POST.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party bear own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William P. Lincke, Andrew Mutch Knowlton, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Dunstan McNichol, Philadelphia, for Marcia D. Cammann.
Charles K. Plotnick, King of Prussia, for Frances B. Hrynio and Stephen Cammann.
casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 336
ESTATE of Marcia DeForest POST, Deceased. Appeal of Katherine POST.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 6, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
William P. Lincke, Andrew Mutch Knowlton, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Dunstan McNichol, Philadelphia, for Marcia D. Cammann.
Charles K. Plotnick, King of Prussia, for Frances B. Hrynio and Stephen Cammann.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
